item.title: Fixing 3 errors
item.dc:creator: @madgamer madgamer
item.description:
@madgamer wrote:

Misplaced close brackets

[code]public class client extends Player implements Runnable {

public void uptime() {
sendQuest("@or1@Pk Points: @gre@"+pkPoints+"", 7332);
sendQuest("@or1@Assault Points: @gre@"+assaultKills+"", 7333);
sendQuest("@or1@Pc Points: @gre@"+pcPoints+"", 7334);
//*sendQuest("@or1@Saradomin Kills: @gre@"+saraKills+"", 7335);
sendQuest("@or1@Saradomin Kills: @gre@"+saraKills+"", 7336);
//*sendQuest("@or1@Last connection: @gre@"+playerLastConnect+"", 249);
sendQuest((new StringBuilder()).append(" @or1@Players online: @gre@").append(PlayerHandler.playerCount).toString()+"", 663);
}
public void q8help() {
sendQuest("@dre@Steinscape: GP Bank", 8144); //Title
clearQuestInterface();
sendQuest(“Welcome to the GP Bank information guide”, 8148);
sendQuest("", 8149);
sendQuest("::addtoken - Converts 2000m into a token", 8150);
sendQuest("::withdraw - Converts a token into 2000m", 8151);
sendQuest("", 8152);
sendQuest(“The GP Bank feature allows you to store in more money!”, 8149);
sendQuestSomething(8143);
showInterface(8134);
flushOutStream();

                    }

[/code]

Read full topic

item.description:

hey i added this.

[code]public class client extends Player implements Runnable {

sendQuest("@or1@Pk Points: @gre@"+pkPoints+"", 7332);
